group_1.narration: I am Mitama Yakumo.@Young and vivacious...@I'm like everyone's big sister.
I had no particular New Year's plans...@But desperate to try something new,@I began cleaning up the shop and@decorating it for the holiday.

group_1.textLeft: This...and this... [chara:101700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101700:cheek_0][chara:101700:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]Goodness, there are so@many.

group_1.textRight: Huh? Are those...

group_1.textLeft: Lots of blessed salt and protective charms!
They were on sale for cheap, so I bought@a bunch.

group_1.textRight: Whoooaaa!

Those are protective charms?! [chara:300601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:300601:motion_100][chara:300601:cheek_0][chara:300601:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:300601:lipSynch_1]The flower@print is mega stylish!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Oh, you noticed? It looks so cute and@tasteful, don't you think?

group_1.textRight: Uhhh, no. They look like you got ripped off!
Mitama...why did you buy all these charms?@And salt?

group_1.textLeft: I have to purify the building before we@head into the new year, of course!

group_1.textRight: Well, your idea isn't a bad one in and of@itself, but...

group_1.textLeft: I have some amulets and power stones too!

group_1.textRight: None of these are New Year's decorations!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]For real? Why not?!

group_1.textRight: I'm sure the charms and stones you have@are very effective...
However, being effective doesn't mean they@make for good New Year's decorations.
Hmm... But they're still effective.
If we hang them all up then we should see@the full extent of their power!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, yeah! C'mon, we goootta do it!

group_1.textRight: Salt and charms... And amulets and power@stones...everywhere...

group_1.textLeft: Well, the atmosphere in here sure has@changedâ™ª

group_1.textRight: This place feels like some fortune-teller's@hut now! Like a hotspot for ghosts!

group_1.textLeft: A pretty poor fit for a Coordinator.

group_1.textRight: I think we oughta tell Mitama it's better@to keep them tucked away.

group_1.textLeft: Yes!

group_1.textRight: Hey, Mitama!

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm?

group_1.textRight: It's actually not great for purification@items and stones to be out in the open air.
It's best you keep 'em tucked away until the@time is right!

group_1.textLeft: What?! Well...when will the time be@right, then?

group_1.textRight: Sometime in the future that isn't now!
Here, we'll help you put 'em away!

group_1.textCenter: Ahhh... It looks so pretty in here.
I just realized I forgot to ask what kind of@New Year's decorations would look nice...

group_1.textRight: Are you in here, Mitama?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Kanagi! Welcome.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?!
How can this be... Your place is sparkling@clean!

group_1.textLeft: Yes! The others came over and helped me.@Now it's so shiny!

group_1.textRight: Incredible... I'm honestly impressed.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, right!
Do you decorate for New Year's at your@part-time job?

group_1.textRight: Well, yes... Why do you ask?

group_1.textLeft: I tried to decorate in here...
But I just can't figure out what's best...

group_1.textRight: You needn't be gaudy or wild. Just use@bamboo ornaments and the like.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, will that do?
I always thought you needed to hang up@something really special.

group_1.textRight: Hmmm... Well, they may not be special...
But decorations for businesses are typically@bigger than ones for home.

group_1.textLeft: Ohh, that sounds like it'll stand out.
Maybe I'll get one.

group_1.textRight: They can get rather pricey.

group_1.textLeft: Well... That's no good.
Honestly, why can't they be cheap AND big@and dazzling? That'd be the best.

group_1.textRight: Hmm... Why don't you try making something@yourself?

group_1.textLeft: Can I?

group_1.textRight: I could tell you where to get materials and @introduce you to a good teacher.
Though it might take some time. What do@you say?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101700:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...!
Well, I'd love to try!
